basics.name: Samantha Limon
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

highlights: Pick up and distribute mail, forward mail to proper personnel
File materials as instructed by supervisor
Answer phone and assist with inquiries

activities.organization: Instructional Design and Educational Assessment (IDEA) Research Group
activities.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Work on student-led computer science research funded by UROP
Attend weekly meetings with principal investigator and other IDEA lab student researchers
Plan and organize community service events for over 60 club members, including volunteer activities and donation drives
Communicate with respective outside sources and club members through regular meetings, email, and social media

awards.title: Douglas S. Yamamura Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded to applicant(s) of the highest-regarded UROP project proposal during each funding cycle to support undergraduate research and creative work at UH Mānoa.

awards.title: State of Hawai’i B Plus Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded to undergraduate students who graduated from a State of Hawai’i public high school and ompleted a rigorous high school curriculum.
